title: Which of the following are true? (Choose 3)

choices.a: Anonymous functions can accept variables passed into them at call time
choices.b: Anonymous functions cannot be called recursively
choices.c: Closures are a kind of anonymous function
choices.d: Anonymous functions can have function names
choices.e: It is possible to return multiple values from an anonymous function
choices.f: Closures can have variable values “baked” in at declare time
choices.g: Anonymous functions are always created in the global scope
